name: Basic food insecurity model
description: A simple model using knowledge provided by Delphi

rules.metadata: rainfall is increasing the risk of flooding

food insecurity is driven by consecutive poor rains
conflict also increases people's food insecurity
rules.rule:
food_insecurity > (5/7) * (70 - precipitation)  +   5 * conflict   - 1;
food_insecurity < (5/7) * (70 - precipitation)  +   5 * conflict   + 1;

rules.metadata: conflict into the most productive state of the country, which also led to a sharp decrease in cultivated area and crop production
conflict further disrupts livelihoods and limits humanitarian assistance
